text:
Heard Someone Say When Asked If A Person Needs A Mask After Getting #CoronavirusVaccine, That There Is Uncertainty If You Need A #Mask After Getting #COVID19 #Vaccine!
WELL I SAY ERR ON UNCERTAINTY AND #WEARYOURDAMNMASK!!!
#WearAMask 
#WearYourMask 
#WearAMaskSavesLives https://t.co/XvRPzaWhvR
